name: Developer Roadmap AI Guide
description: Interactive learning companion based on developer-roadmap.sh. 65 different career paths with 7 specialized agents, personalized learning tracks, skill assessment, and hands-on projects.

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start learning journey - select career path from 65 different roles

commands.name: explore-roles
commands.description: Explore all 65 developer roles and career paths

commands.name: assess-skills
commands.description: Assess current skills and get personalized recommendations

commands.name: browse-projects
commands.description: Browse hands-on projects by difficulty level and skills

agents.name: Backend & DevOps Specialist
agents.description: Expert in server-side development, DevOps, infrastructure, and deployment strategies

agents.name: Frontend & Mobile Developer
agents.description: Specialist in web frontends, mobile apps, UI/UX and cross-platform development

agents.name: Data & AI Engineer
agents.description: Expert in data engineering, machine learning, AI, and analytics

agents.name: Architecture & Design
agents.description: Specialist in system architecture, design patterns, and scalable solutions

agents.name: Languages & Databases
agents.description: Expert in programming languages mastery and database technologies

agents.name: Management & Product
agents.description: Specialist in engineering management, product strategy, and team leadership

agents.name: Quality & Security
agents.description: Expert in testing, security, QA automation, and cyber protection
